knimeNode.name: Build CWL Record
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a CWL record object from other objects.

fullDescription.intro: This node merges several CWL objects into a record object. If the third port is a record, the two other ports are inserted into this object. Otherwise all three objects are merged into a new record.

ports.inPort: A CWL object to put into the record.
A CWL object to put into the record.
A CWL object to put into the record or, if this is a record, the record to append the other objects to.
